column1: The majority of autistics strongly dislike the puzzle piece symbol
column2: prefer identity first language ('autistic person' instead of 'person with autism')
column3: and prefer red or gold instead of (light it up) blue."

I have sensory issues."

column1: I have Cardiac Sarcoidosis. Inflammation in the heart disrupted the electrical functions
column2: which caused severe ventricular tachycardia and v. fibrillation 2020. Got unconscious 5 times.

column1: If I ever had tachycardia/fibrillation again
column2: my defib would return the rhythm."

column1: -Chest pain/tightness
-Shortness of breath
-Lightheadedness
-Feeling fainty/loss of consciousness
-Fatigue
-Irregular heartbeats (arrhythmias)
-Rapid/fluttering heart beat (palpitations)
-Blurry vision
-Swelling
#WorldHeartDay #HeartHealth"
